results.name: Back to the basics
results.description:
Discover, where it all began. I had an awesome custom search saved for searching on host information, but can't find it. Maybe you can help me?

![old_kibana.jpg](/files/38e1f2caddfb9e33ee63ddeb96140a4f/old_kibana.jpg)

results.name: I like a good query.
results.description: Come to think of it, I think I had a gnarly saved query also, please find it for me!

results.name: Ahh, that is quite the (Data) View
results.description:
Data views are great to narrow focus on a specific dataset. Thankfully I created the perfect data view for analyzing random events, but I forgot what events I was mapping these too, please help!

![](https://cdn.crowdriff.com/in-use/88de5ecf-7fa6-8684-15b9-4ee9586f4633/1080.jpg)

results.name: Ahh, that is quite the (Data) View [Bonus]
results.description:
Also, I am not a fan of these random IDs that get associated with my data views since it is a nightmare when figuring out what data view was applied to my searches or dashboards when they get removed, so I created my own muhahahah!

![](https://cdn.crowdriff.com/in-use/34dfa25e-208e-a898-f577-d109adb6a053/1080.jpg)

results.name: Advanced Query
results.description:
Sometimes the queries I find are very hard to understand. Maybe if I slowed down to read through the query, then perhaps it will make sense!

![](https://preview.redd.it/jfl6i8ch8kc41.jpg?auto=webp&s=a40ec06bb002b4b5d013dc9aea00e145f9a88899)

results.name: Future
results.description:
I have heard tales of computer systems so advanced that they predict (and log into) the future!

![](https://media1.tenor.com/m/Vi0AbgoMvXAAAAAd/future-spongebob.gif)

results.name: Context, please.
results.description: Every now and again I see fields that I am unsure of what they mean, especially in this weird future event. They should really have a description on those!

results.name: ⚠️ 🕰️ ⛏️
results.description:
Good news, I cracked the code on creating a custom time selection. I created the perfect time selector that upper management need which just might get me promoted. Don't steal my idea!

On a completly unrelated note, how many days has it been since our last incident? I need to validate something. . .

Answer is in the format of: {ctf_X_days_since_last_incident} where X = number of days.

![](https://media1.tenor.com/m/FkJZe6MJ2u8AAAAd/rafiki-its-time.gif)

results.name: Patt Erns
results.description:
There is a new guy in town and his name is Patt Erns. He claims there is an easy way to identify interesting arrangements of data, and he has only been here for the past **6 hours**. Is this something that you know how to do?

![](https://wallpapersok.com/images/hd/doge-meme-faces-pattern-fqbgpvculd0224cz.jpg)

results.name: Data is more than what meets the eye
results.description:
Allegedly Kibana can render more than just plain text in fields. I wonder if it can render images! Bonus points for the first one to figure this out!

⚠️ Caution: This requires making changes that others will see, so once you figure it out, you may want to "undo" your changes :)

![](https://y.yarn.co/a0a279b0-ab4f-43c2-82ce-ad3f6de61381_text.gif)

results.name: Conjuction Junction
results.description:
ES|QL is the new coolness so I have been dabbling into the new capabilities that this search provides. Try and find the hidden message in my query, have fun!

![](https://shopabctv.com/cdn/shop/products/SHR-CJ_ABC_SchoolHouseRock_Delta11730_White_RO_1080x.jpg?v=1592229651)

results.name: Strange Activity
results.description:
I have been tracking this very unusual suspect and I am trying to get a good understanding of what in the world is going on. Please help me.

![](https://media.tenor.com/rB8hWIin-2IAAAAM/hmm-suspect.gif)

results.name: No Comment
results.description:
Apparently you can use comments in ES|QL - nice.

![](https://media.tenor.com/6B2uvITD1OIAAAAM/bh187-minions.gif)

results.name: ES|QL + Lens
results.description:
You can create Lens visuals with ES|QL! Check out the sample ES|QL query that spawns a Lens visual. See if you can edit the lens visual and find the flag I hid in there :).

![](https://media.tenor.com/ZCWrGGgfwowAAAAd/spongebob-squarepants-title.gif)

results.name: Argh, Metadata? Again?
results.description:
Metadata can be useful sometimes as it can provide unique information to the events them selves. Typically document IDs are randomized on creation, but sometimes they are generated for a specific purpose so that data is updated over time. Take a look at my ES|QL query and figure out how to reveal the metadata.

![](https://www.smartinsights.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/Dudethisisboring.png)
